sentence: If you pay extra and want good service look elsewhere
And at the prices you should really want to enjoy it
there is free wifi but if you want a decent speed wifi you have to pay extra even if you are a Starwod member
This is a very expensive hotel so you should be enjoying what you pay for sooner than later
Prices are steep but presumably that is location
The breakfast was expensive n disappointing
Snacks were expensive and we opened grapefruit candies to find a small pack of gummy worms
The only negative that i can say is that the valet parking was extremely expensive discounts should have been granted to hotel guests as there was no where else to park your car
would nt recoment breakfast for the price aswel
Parking is additional cost
The restaurant TRES is very good pricy but nice
the outlets were all on one wall in between the dining room and bedroom like as if you are going to leave your devices on the floor charging five feet away from you
it is a good hotel but they charge a lot of extra money
My in room dining breakfasts were wonderful if a bit pricey and my in room dinner burgers and fries were great and a bit more reasonable at 38 total

I just want to go back to la and that hotel because the things where so nice the rooms where big and very nice decorated with a little mini sofa and a snack bar and the breakfast was expensive but if you take the buffet it wo n’t disappoint you because there ’s a lot of things you can eat instead of just one plate of food that ’s expensive but the buffet is a must and the staff where really nice and the service could improve but the pool at the roof is brilliant nice with some beds that you can lay on and the view from the roof is magical this hotel is a must for the families and business men ’s
Centrally located and great price
com booked a hotel on there and they had the best rates anywhere
In the past I could call the manager and get an incredible rate and be upgraded to a suite
Well worth the price which was reasonable
Nice hotel but pricey
Again it was nice but the main complaint is price with points off for location as well
